text: Miles Maryott (1873 - September 20, 1939) was an American baseball player, painter, and convicted murderer. His paintings can be seen at the Museum of Nebraska Art in Kearney, Nebraska. ==References== Category:1873 births Category:1939 deaths Category:People from Tekamah, Nebraska Category:Baseball players from Nebraska Category:Painters from Nebraska Category:American people convicted of murder
title: Miles Maryott
